newsitem.title: UK: Virgin Atlantic details summer schedule.
newsitem.headline: Virgin Atlantic details summer schedule.

text.p: Virgin Atlantic said it will launch a daily London Gatwick to New York Newark on June 26 as part of its summer schedule.
From July 10 it will operate a second daily London Heathrow to Los Ange1es service giving a weekly total of 14 flights using a new Airbus Industrie long-haul A340 aircraft.
The current London Gatwick service to Miami will be replaced by a daily Heathrow flight from June 30, the company said in a statement.
The Heathrow to Johannesburg service will become daily from 15 July after offering six flights a week from March 1,it added.

The company said it is receiving five new aircraft this year -two Boeing 747-400s and three Airbus A340-300s, increasing its fleet to 20 aircraft. - Reuters Air Cargo Newsroom Tel+44 171 542 7706 Fax:5017
